bind.name: watch
bind.value: 'newTipIdTop'; isRepeatFinalShipNewTipActive ? SC.Context_guiding_tip.TIP_TYPE.RESEARCH_FINAL_REPEAT : isCrewBlockedDivisionTipActive ? SC.Context_guiding_tip.TIP_TYPE.CREW_BLOCKED_DIV_READY : isCrewBlockedLockedTipActive ? SC.Context_guiding_tip.TIP_TYPE.CREW_BLOCKED_BATTLE : isEhBlockedByDivisionTipActive ? SC.Context_guiding_tip.TIP_TYPE.EVENT_HUB_BATTLE_CARD_BLOCKED_DIV_READY : isEhCardFinalTipActive ? SC.Context_guiding_tip.TIP_TYPE.EVENT_HUB_BATTLE_CARD_FINAL : isEhBriefingDescrTipActive ? SC.Context_guiding_tip.TIP_TYPE.EVENT_HUB_BRIEFING_DESCRIPTION : isEhBlockedByShipTipActive ? SC.Context_guiding_tip.TIP_TYPE.EVENT_HUB_BATTLE_CARD_BLOCKED_WRONG_SHIP : isEhBlockedByRepairTipActive ? SC.Context_guiding_tip.TIP_TYPE.EVENT_HUB_BATTLE_CARD_BLOCKED_MAINTENANCE : SC.Context_guiding_tip.TIP_TYPE.NONE

bind.name: child
bind.value: notNullPortSubroute || 'main'; {shipId: shipId, shipIdForModuleInset: shipIdForModuleInset}; {main: 'PortMainInset', profile: 'ProfileMainInset', research: 'ShipResearchMainInset', management: 'ShipManagementMainInset', exterior: 'ExteriorsMainInset', clans: 'ClanMainInset', event_hub_equipment: 'ShipManagementStInset', event_hub_progress: 'EventHubProgressInset', event_hub_collection: 'EventHubCollectionInset'}

bind.name: instance
bind.value: 'MainTabButton'; isResearchUnlocked ? { _label: 'IDS_MODULES', _name: 'DockSubMenuModules', _selected: currentPortSubroute == SC.Ui_windows.ROUTE.MANAGEMENT, _action: 'navigateTo', _actionParams: {route: SC.Ui_windows.ROUTE.MANAGEMENT}, _dispatch: 'hideCrew', _disabled: !isAnyShipAvailable, _isNewMarker: isNewModulesMarker, _isAttentionMarker: isSignalsExpired } : null

bind.name: watch
bind.value: 'managementTipID'; modIntroNewTipActive ? SC.Context_guiding_tip.TIP_TYPE.MODERNIZATION_INTRO : modIntroRepeatNewTipActive ? SC.Context_guiding_tip.TIP_TYPE.MODERNIZATION_INTRO_REPEAT : freeXPIntroNewTipActive ? SC.Context_guiding_tip.TIP_TYPE.FREE_XP_MODULE_TAB : freeXPIntroRepeatNewTipActive ? SC.Context_guiding_tip.TIP_TYPE.FREE_XP_MODULE_TAB_REPEAT : battleBonusIntroNewTipActive ? SC.Context_guiding_tip.TIP_TYPE.BATTLE_BONUS_INTRO : battleBonusIntroRepeatNewTipActive ? SC.Context_guiding_tip.TIP_TYPE.BATTLE_BONUS_INTRO_REPEAT : tacticalConsumablesNewTipActive ? SC.Context_guiding_tip.TIP_TYPE.TACTICAL_CONSUMABLES : detonationRemovalNewTipActive ? SC.Context_guiding_tip.TIP_TYPE.DETONATION_REMOVAL_TIP : SC.Context_guiding_tip.TIP_TYPE.NONE

bind.name: instance
bind.value: 'MainTabButton'; isCamouflagesUnlocked ? { _label: 'IDS_EXTERIOR', _name: 'DockSubMenuExterior', _selected: currentPortSubroute == SC.Ui_windows.ROUTE.EXTERIOR, _action: 'navigateTo', _actionParams: { route: SC.Ui_windows.ROUTE.EXTERIOR }, _dispatch: 'hideCrew', _disabled: !isAnyShipAvailable, _isNewMarker: isNewExteriorMarker, _isAttentionMarker: isCamouflageAttentionMarkerVisible } : null

bind.name: instance
bind.value: 'MainTabButton'; isResearchUnlocked ? { _label: 'IDS_RESEARCH', _name: 'DockSubMenuResearch', _selected: currentPortSubroute == SC.Ui_windows.ROUTE.RESEARCH, _action: 'navigateTo', _actionParams: {route: SC.Ui_windows.ROUTE.RESEARCH}, _dispatch: 'hideCrew', _isNewMarker: isParagonEnabled && isNotSeenParagonInShipTree || isNotSeenShipTreeBranches } : null

bind.name: instance
bind.value: 'MainTabButton'; { _label: 'IDS_PROFILE', _name: 'DockSubMenuProfile', _selected: currentPortSubroute == SC.Ui_windows.ROUTE.PROFILE, _action: 'navigateTo', _actionParams: { route: SC.Ui_windows.ROUTE.PROFILE }, _dispatch: 'hideCrew', _newContentCounter: newCardsCounter, _isNewMarker: feature_16 == 'new' && rankSeasonEntity }

bind.name: instance
bind.value: 'MainTabButton'; { _label: clanLabel, _name: 'DockSubMenuClan', _selected: currentPortSubroute == SC.Ui_windows.ROUTE.CLANS, _action: 'navigateTo', _actionParams: {route: SC.Ui_windows.ROUTE.CLANS, data: {url: SC.Ui_windows.GUI_URL.CLANS_IN_GAME}}, _dispatch: 'hideCrew', _isNewMarker: feature_27 == 'new' && !selfPlayerEntity.clanman }

bind.name: instance
bind.value: 'MainTabButton'; { _label: 'IDS_EVENT_HUB_EQUIPMENT', _name: 'DockSubMenuEventHubEquipment', _selected: currentEventHubSubroute == SC.Ui_windows.ROUTE.EVENT_HUB_EQUIPMENT, _action: 'navigateTo', _actionParams: { route: SC.Ui_windows.ROUTE.EVENT_HUB_EQUIPMENT }, _dispatch: 'hideCrew', _isNewMarker: unseenModulesCollection.length > 0 || newBattleCardsCounter > 0 }

bind.name: instance
bind.value: 'NewGuidingTipHub'; newTipIdTop != SC.Context_guiding_tip.TIP_TYPE.NONE ? { _newTipId: newTipIdTop, _tipPositioning: 'bottom', _offset: 5, _hasFinishButton: hasFinishButtonTop, _hasNextButton: hasNextButtonTop, _noPointer: true, _tipShownEvent: tipShownEvent, _buttonLogEvent: buttonLogEvent } : null

bind.name: instance
bind.value: 'NewGuidingTipHub'; newTipIdBottom != SC.Context_guiding_tip.TIP_TYPE.NONE ? { _newTipId: newTipIdBottom, _tipPositioning: 'bottom', _offset: 0, _hasNextButton: true, _noPointer: true, _tipShownEvent: tipShownEvent, _buttonLogEvent: buttonLogEvent } : null

bind.name: watch
bind.value: 'clickAction'; isGold ? isOpenPremInClientBrowser ? null : 'gotoUrlByIdent' : isCredits ? 'creditsGoldWindow' : isFreeXP ? 'xpFreeExpWindow' : null

bind.name: watch
bind.value: 'clickRequest'; isGold ? isOpenPremInClientBrowser ? isEGSClient || isMergedShopsRealm ? 'openMetashop' : 'openPremShop' : null : null

bind.name: request
watch
bind.value: 'lootedMoney'; {gold: {finalPrice: accountGoldLooted, currency: 'gold'}, credits: { finalPrice: accountCreditsLooted, currency: 'credits'}}

bind.name: watch
bind.value: 'purchasedMoney'; {gold: {finalPrice: accountGoldPurchased, currency: 'gold'}, credits: { finalPrice: accountCreditsPurchased, currency: 'credits'}}

bind.name: watch
bind.value: 'mouseInstruction'; {_unifiedStatus: SC.Ui_styles.UNIFIED_STATUS.MOUSE_LEFT, _text: _currency == SC.Common.CURRENCIES.STEEL || _currency == SC.Common.CURRENCIES.COAL || _currency == SC.Common.CURRENCIES.ELITE_XP || _currency == SC.Common.CURRENCIES.PARAGON_XP || _currency == SC.Common.CURRENCIES.RECRUITMENT_POINTS ? 'IDS_GO_TO_METASHOP_MOUSE_INSTRUCTION' : 'IDS_CURRENCY_' + toUpperCase(_currency) + '_MOUSE_INSTRUCTION'}
